程序包 org.apache.giraph.comm.messages

Package of communication related objects, IPC service.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    BasicMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Most basic message store with just add, get and clear operations
    FlushableMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Message stores which has flush operation
    MessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Message store
    MessageStoreByPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Message store which stores data by partition
    MessageStoreFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,S extends BasicMessageStore<I,M>>
    Factory for message stores
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implementation of SimpleMessageStore where multiple messages are stored per vertex as byte arrays.
    DiskBackedMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Message storage with in-memory map of messages and with support for flushing all the messages to the disk.
    DiskBackedMessageStoreByPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Message store which separates data by partitions, and submits them to underlying message store.
    OneMessagePerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implementation of SimpleMessageStore where we have a single message per vertex.
    SequentialFileMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Used for writing and reading collection of messages to the disk.
    SimpleMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,T>
    Abstract class for MessageStoreByPartition which allows any kind of object to hold messages for one vertex.
